attributes.action: recognise that the people of scotland constitute a diverse nation of people, and a such have a obligation to themselves to determine the means of seeing to the needs of the nation of Scots
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Scots are a historical entity.
Being a Scot is more than a political or social allegience.
The wealth of knowledge from Scotland will see to our needs.
Since our royal lineage is no more, we will follow a republican course of development in governance.
Those in Scotland who opose indepedence are traitors not only to their blood but to the comming Scottish nation.
We will be free and at liberty in personal and social life, but not to the detriment of our fellow Scots.
